about_the_game:
"A story driven realistic extraction based shooter."


Chronos Affinity marks the first official release of GP Creative Studios. Dive into the immersive story and fight other players as you inch closer to the truth. Chronos Affinity boasts THREE explosive game modes that offer a unique and exciting way to progress through the story. Choose between PMC, DELTA CELL, and ALL OUT WAR modes to keep your experience fresh. Each game mode comes with their own story driven tasks and rewards.



PMC


Take on the role of the primary character and embark on a journey of self-discovery. You will be pitted against other players who are actively trying to stop you from progressing through an intricate story line.
This game mode is the players primary character and the ONLY mode allowing you to progress through the story line. Explore your environment, make connections, and be sure to trust NO ONE. Be sure to keep a sharp eye on your surroundings as other players are actively tracking you to eliminate you and stop you from reaching your goals. But why?



DELTA CELL


Take the role of a secrete elite tactical team tasked with stopping the primary characters from reaching their goals. This mode adds a new level of excitement and challenge to the game. Overcome obstacles and outsmart your opponents.



ALL OUT WAR


ONLY available after beating the game, load into the post-disastrous ruins of the city. Raid, fight, loot, and grow your inventory to better prepare yourself for survival.
This mode has gaming competitors in mind and will have a ranking system.
Like competitions? This is the mode that will host ALL Chronos Affinity sponsored tournaments.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 or 1650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 2700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 Super
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible
